    "Question": "After a spelling test, Alex is calculating their score. They have answered 25 questions correctly out of 30 questions total. They wish to represent this score as a fraction, a decimal, and a percentage. In which of the following ways has Alex accurately represented their score?",
    "Answer1": "Fraction: 25/30, Decimal: 0.83, Percentage: 83%",

    "Answer4": "Fraction: 30/25, Decimal: 0.83, Percentage: 83%",
    "CorrectAnswer": "1",
    "Explanation": "Alex has answered 25 questions correctly out of 30. This can be represented as a fraction 25/30. And to convert this decimal to a percentage, Alex would multiply it by 100 to get 83%."
